description.brief: As an exchange student, I have been fortunate to serve as a Teaching Assistant. My role involves actively participating in the university's official program known as the Global Lounge. This program facilitates weekly meetings where Korean and international students can come together, explore various themes, and engage in different activities. Working alongside fellow Indonesian, Japanese, and Korean students, we collaboratively organize and manage this program on a weekly basis, fostering a vibrant and inclusive campus environment.

After undergoing a thorough selection process that spanned half of a semester (3 mo), I was fortunate to be chosen as one of the two selected assistants for the Laboratory Center in Bandung. This opportunity granted me an official part-time role as an assistant, where I had the privilege to provide support in the teaching process within the Computer Science Department's laboratory.
BNCC is a highly esteemed organization within the Binus University. As activists, we organized a diverse range of special events and monthly gatherings covering various technology-related topics.
detail: Member of the Learning and Training (LnT) team
Active involvement in organizational activities for 2 semesters during university
Served as Chief Committee for LnT Camp 2022
Contributed as event staff for various events, including Techbinar

description.brief: I had the opportunity to serve as a trainer for HIMTI's PBP Techno programming class, where I engaged with over 40 freshmen in an online setting.
